The cabin is wired for a generator and has the added convenience of running water, gravity fed by a fillable water tank. Not to mention it's got the cutest outhouse ever! Surrounded on 3 sides by Crown Land, This is the place for you to get away from it all, kick back and relax!

Fenced, cross fenced, treed with multiple pastures and a cattle guard at the front and rear of the property. Yearly oil revenue of over $10,000 with limitless possibilities. Plenty of water throughout as the creek runs through the property, a beaver dam provides a great pond - great for livestock, or recreation - make your dream a reality!
